home.title: Atlas Catalog
home.subtitle: Centralized API catalog management system for tracking and managing your microservices, APIs, and digital assets.

catalog.title: API Catalog
catalog.description: Browse and manage your complete API inventory with rich metadata and documentation.

types.title: API Types
types.description: Categorize your APIs by type: REST, GraphQL, SOAP, and more.

lifecycles.title: Lifecycles
lifecycles.description: Track API lifecycle stages from development to production.

languages.title: Programming Languages
languages.description: Organize APIs by the programming languages they use.

domains.title: Business Domains
domains.description: Group services by business domains for clear ownership.

discovery.title: Discovery Sources
discovery.description: Track how APIs were discovered and registered in the catalog.

quickStart.title: Getting Started
quickStart.features: Full CRUD operations for APIs, Types, Lifecycles, and more

errors.load: We couldn't load the APIs. Please try again.
